item.title: By: Craig Dunn
item.dc:creator: Craig Dunn
item.description:
Hey Aaron, nice little example. I added an alternate implementation for the Distance() method that uses the SQL Server 2008 SqlGeography type to my blog...
http://conceptdev.blogspot.com/2009/01/calculating-distance-in-c-with.html
Wouldn't work in Silverlight - but still an interesting alternative if you wanted to do more complex geospatial calculations.
item.content:encoded:
Hey Aaron, nice little example. I added an alternate implementation for the Distance() method that uses the SQL Server 2008 SqlGeography type to my blog…

http://conceptdev.blogspot.com/2009/01/calculating-distance-in-c-with.html

Wouldn’t work in Silverlight – but still an interesting alternative if you wanted to do more complex geospatial calculations.
